TopicSection.Content:
You can include multiple headers by grouping various column headers together.

To group the headers, add a composite column object in column configuration, For example: {caption: 'header', columns: [col1,col2,col3] }.

You can also set the "expanded" and "collapsed" property in column groups to show or hide them respectively. This property allows you to expand/collapse some columns.

The following image shows how multiple column headers appear after applying code:

  • When 'Contact Info' column is expanded.
